mapper.insert: insert into members (id, name, password, birthdate, address, phone, gender) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{birthdate}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{gender});
mapper.select: select id, name, password, birthdate, address, phone, gender, auth from members where id = #{id}
select id, name, birthdate, address, phone, gender, auth from members where id = #{id}

select id, name, address, phone, gender, birthdate from members
limit #{skip}, #{size}
